project_description: A professional portfolio website for an AI & Data Science Engineer, featuring a clean and modern design.

content.headline: I'M AN AI & DATA SCIENCE ENGINEER
content.name: YASMIN EHAB
content.bio: Greetings, fellow innovators! I'm Yasmin Ehab, a passionate AI & Data Science Engineer focused on transforming complex data into intelligent, actionable solutions. Welcome to my portfolio.

services_list.title: Machine Learning
services_list.description: Building, training, and deploying advanced predictive models for various industries.

services_list.title: Data Engineering
services_list.description: Designing and implementing scalable data pipelines and robust data infrastructure.

services_list.title: Natural Language Processing (NLP)
services_list.description: Developing AI models to understand, analyze, and generate human language.

services_list.title: Computer Vision
services_list.description: Creating intelligent systems that can interpret and analyze visual information from the world.

services_list.title: Data Analysis & Visualization
services_list.description: Extracting meaningful insights from data and presenting them through interactive dashboards.

services_list.title: Cloud Solutions
services_list.description: Deploying and managing data solutions on cloud platforms like AWS, Azure, and GCP.

content.title: About Me
content.description: With a strong academic background in Intelligent Systems Engineering at the Faculty of Artificial Intelligence, and solid hands-on experience from the DEPI AI & Data Science track, I bring a comprehensive understanding of Artificial Intelligence and Data Science. I thrive on solving complex problems and am passionate about leveraging data to design innovative, intelligent solutions that drive business growth and efficiency.

education.degree: B.Sc. in Intelligent Systems Engineering, Faculty of Artificial Intelligence

experience.title: DEPI Internship
experience.company: Ministry of Communications and Information Technology
experience.description: Participating in a comprehensive training track focused on Artificial Intelligence and Data Science using Microsoft technologies. Learning to build and deploy machine learning models on Microsoft Azure, and apply AI algorithms across multiple domains.

experience.title: Creativa Innovation Hubs Internship
experience.description: Completed 35-hour training with hands-on experience in building machine learning models, Explored real-world AI applications and data-driven problem solving, Strengthened foundational knowledge in AI and fostered continuous learning habits.

projects_list.title: Digital Image Processing
projects_list.description: For every operation, our GUI allows the user to upload an image, apply the technique, and visualize the result next to the original using subplot displays – making the transformations easy to observe and understand.

projects_list.title: Laptop Recommendation System
projects_list.description: we worked as a team to build a Laptop Recommendation System using real-world data and a complete data science workflow — from raw data to insightful predictions

projects_list.title: Machine Learning Workflow App.
projects_list.description: How to design and implement a general-purpose ML tool, Strengthened teamwork & collaboration on real-world ML workflows, Practical experience in data preprocessing, feature engineering, and model evaluation, Creating an interactive & user-friendly ML application with Streamlit.

content.title: Pricing & Packages
content.description: Explore flexible packages designed to fit a wide range of needs, from small-scale projects to full-stack solutions.

testimonials_list.text: Working with Yasmin Ehab was a game-changer. Her expertise in AI brought our project to life and exceeded all expectations.
The data insights provided were incredibly valuable and helped us make strategic decisions. Highly recommended!

content.title: Let's Build Something Great
content.description: I'm always open to new opportunities and collaborations. Feel free to reach out and discuss your project.
